Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe will greatly benefit you based on your needs and preferences. Given its value to you, I propose a price of $9,500 for the product. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the high demand and unique features that make this product an exceptional investment for you. I look forward to your consideration. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
